name: py-azure-cli-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools Core Module.

dependencies.name: py-adal
dependencies.description:
The ADAL for Python library makes it easy for python application to
authenticate to Azure Active Directory (AAD) in order to access AAD
protected web resources. DEPRECATED: replaced by MSAL Python.

dependencies.name: py-argcomplete
dependencies.description: Bash tab completion for argparse.

dependencies.name: py-azure-cli-telemetry
dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure CLI Telemetry Package.

dependencies.name: py-azure-mgmt-core
dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Management Core Library for Python.

dependencies.name: py-azure-mgmt-resource
dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Resource Management Client Library for Python.

dependencies.name: py-colorama
dependencies.description: Cross-platform colored terminal text.

dependencies.name: py-humanfriendly
dependencies.description: Human friendly output for text interfaces using Python

dependencies.name: py-jmespath
dependencies.description: JSON Matching Expressions.

dependencies.name: py-knack
dependencies.description: A Command-Line Interface framework.

dependencies.name: py-msal
dependencies.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) for Python library enables
your app to access the Microsoft Cloud by supporting authentication of
users with Microsoft Azure Active Directory accounts (AAD) and Microsoft
Accounts (MSA) using industry standard OAuth2 and OpenID Connect.

dependencies.name: py-msal-extensions
dependencies.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Extensions for Python offers secure
mechanisms for client applications to perform cross-platform token cache
serialization and persistence. It gives additional support to the
Microsoft Authentication Library for Python (MSAL).

dependencies.name: py-msrest
dependencies.description: AutoRest swagger generator Python client runtime.

dependencies.name: py-msrestazure
dependencies.description: AutoRest swagger generator Python client runtime. Azure-specific module.

dependencies.name: py-paramiko
dependencies.description: SSH2 protocol library

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pkginfo
dependencies.description: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyjwt
dependencies.description: JSON Web Token implementation in Python

dependencies.name: py-pyopenssl
dependencies.description:
High-level wrapper around a subset of the OpenSSL library. Note: The
Python Cryptographic Authority strongly suggests the use of
pyca/cryptography where possible. If you are using pyOpenSSL for
anything other than making a TLS connection you should move to
cryptography and drop your pyOpenSSL dependency.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-six
dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
